ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:0.5_0: 13. The training rule on two parts
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.2_0: At that time, when the monks from the group of six knew that the Buddha had prohibited having blankets made entirely of black wool, they added just a little bit of white on the edge. In this way they had blankets made entirely of black wool.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.3_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.4_0: “How can the monks from the group of six act like this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.5_0: After criticizing those monks in many ways, they told the Buddha ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.6_0: “Is it true, monks, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.9_0: “... Foolish men, how can you add just a little bit of white on the edge and in this way have blankets made entirely of black wool?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.10_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.11_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.12.1_0: ‘If a monk is having a new blanket made, he should use two parts of entirely black wool, a third part of white, and a fourth part of brown.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:1.13_0: If he has a new blanket made without using two parts of entirely black wool, a third part of white, and a fourth part of brown, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.4_0: it is put out in charge of building work.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.6_0: is building or is having built.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.7_0: He should use two parts of entirely black wool:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.13_0: If he does not develop two parts of entirely black wool, a third part of white, and a fourth part of brown.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.14_0: If he makes it, or has it made, without using two measures of entirely black wool, one measure of white, and one measure of brown, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.15_0: When he gets the sitting-blanket, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.16_0: It should be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.17_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.19_0: ‘Venerables, this blanket which I had made without using two measures of entirely black wool, one measure of white, and one measure of brown, is to be relinquished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.20_0: I relinquish them to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.23_0: ‘I give these tonics back to you.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.24.1_0: If she finishes what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.25_0: If she has others finish what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.26_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.27_0: If she has others finish what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.28_0: If she makes one or has one made for the benefit of someone else, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.29_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.31_0: if he makes one using one measure of white and one measure of brown;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.32_0: if he makes one using white and just brown;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.33_0: if he makes one using just white and just brown;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.34_0: if she makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np13:2.37_0: The third rule, the training rule on two parts, is finished.
